title: "The Roller Conduction Effect" from the A-share Data Evidence. (arXiv:2401.13670v1 [econ.GN])
abstract: In the post-epidemic era, consumption recovery has obvious time and space transmission laws, and there are different valuation criteria for consumption segments. Using the A-share data of the consumption recovery stage from January to April 2022, this paper quantitatively compares the rotation effect between different consumption sectors when the valuation returns to the reasonable range. According to the new classification of "sensory-based consumption", it interprets the internal logic of digital consumption as A consumption upgrade tool and a higher valuation target, and expounds the "the roller conduction effect". The law of consumption recovery and valuation return period is explained from the perspective of time and space conduction. The study found that in the early stage of consumption recovery, the recovery of consumer confidence was slow. translated_title: "A股数据证据中的滚动传导效应"
translated_abstract: 在疫情后的时代，消费复苏具有明显的时空传导规律，不同消费领域存在不同的估值标准。本文利用2022年1月至4月A股消费复苏阶段的数据，定量比较了估值回归合理范围时不同消费领域之间的滚动传导效应。根据“感官为基础的消费”新分类，解读了数字消费作为A股升级工具和更高估值目标的内在逻辑，并阐述了“滚动传导效应”。从时间和空间传导的角度解释了消费复苏和估值回归周期的规律。研究发现，在消费复苏的早期阶段，消费者信心的恢复较为缓慢。在此期间，A股市场主要由股本博弈主导，并存在明显的板块轮动规律。
tldr: 本研究通过对A股数据的分析发现，不同消费领域在估值回归合理范围时存在滚动传导效应，其中数字消费作为升级工具和更高估值目标的内在逻辑被解读为“滚动传导效应”。研究还发现，在消费复苏的早期阶段，消费者信心的恢复较为缓慢，A股市场主要由股本博弈主导，并存在明显的板块轮动规律。
en_tdlr: This study reveals the roller conduction effect within different consumer sectors in the process of valuation regression in A-share market, highlighting the significance of digital consumption as an upgrade tool and a higher valuation target. It further observes the slow recovery of consumer confidence in the early stage of consumption recovery, which leads to a dominance of stock capital game and obvious plate rotation patterns.
